HDG.IM.content: asking of the fundamental metaphysical question is historical: opens up happening of human Dasein in its essential relations > opens to futures to come (Zu-künften), thus binds back to inception > a non-derivative call/summoning of Dasein to its history, call to make a decision
HDG.IM.linkedContent: asking of the fundamental metaphysical question is historical: opens up happening of human Dasein in its essential relations > opens to futures to come (Zu-künften), thus binds back to inception > a non-derivative call/summoning of Dasein to its history, call to make a decision

HDG.BC.content: [beyond philosophy] indefinite title Grundbegriffe: do not commit ourselves to anything in advance [Heidegger opens] > “readiness to put the essence of man at risk in thinking that which grounds this essence,” that which he takes for being [Heidegger closes?]: “whatever grounds everything and gives ground to everything is itself the ground” [causa sui?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [beyond philosophy] indefinite title Grundbegriffe: do not commit ourselves to anything in advance [Heidegger opens] > “readiness to put the essence of man at risk in thinking that which grounds this essence,” that which he takes for being [Heidegger closes?]: “whatever grounds everything and gives ground to everything is itself the ground” [causa sui?]

HDG.BC.content: historical man stands out into openness while subordinating everything needful (Gebrauchte) /useful (Nutzbare) to himself
HDG.BC.linkedContent: historical man stands out into openness while subordinating everything needful (Gebrauchte) /useful (Nutzbare) to himself

HDG.BC.content: Being withholds itself from any grasping on basis of beings, denies itself every concept, every determination, illumination, in every respect for every attempt at an explanation [what about every name???]: thus Being withholds itself, withdraws: self-concealment belongs to being: Being itself “is” concealment ——Being is the most worn-out (Abgegriffenste) > [beings as testimony to Being] lay claim to Being whenever we experience beings > Being expended (in a way) in constant/multiple use in all relation to beings, but Being not used up in expenditure, remains constantly available to us [cf. Open Manifest]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being withholds itself from any grasping on basis of beings, denies itself every concept, every determination, illumination, in every respect for every attempt at an explanation [what about every name???]: thus Being withholds itself, withdraws: self-concealment belongs to being: Being itself “is” concealment ——Being is the most worn-out (Abgegriffenste) > [beings as testimony to Being] lay claim to Being whenever we experience beings > Being expended (in a way) in constant/multiple use in all relation to beings, but Being not used up in expenditure, remains constantly available to us [cf. Open Manifest]

HDG.BC.content: Being as most worn-out coin (abgegriffenste Münze), what is most self-understood, that which we constantly pay for every relation to beings: Being, most worn-out, most indifferent > even when we want Nothing, Being remains, resists expenditure/consumption > in extremity of desired annihilation of all beings, Being must appear [cf. Open Manifest, total annihilation? Being makes annihilation of beings possible]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being as most worn-out coin (abgegriffenste Münze), what is most self-understood, that which we constantly pay for every relation to beings: Being, most worn-out, most indifferent > even when we want Nothing, Being remains, resists expenditure/consumption > in extremity of desired annihilation of all beings, Being must appear [cf. Open Manifest, total annihilation? Being makes annihilation of beings possible]

HDG.BC.content: play of Being, singular univocity of unique [plurivocity?] > Being that which opens, unlocks “openness” of there? [Being opens ontological difference?] > Being sets Being/beings apart, places us into this apartness & the free, liberation in belongingness to Being [Schelling on freedom]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: play of Being, singular univocity of unique [plurivocity?] > Being that which opens, unlocks “openness” of there? [Being opens ontological difference?] > Being sets Being/beings apart, places us into this apartness & the free, liberation in belongingness to Being [Schelling on freedom]

HDG.BC.content: in the casting away & toward us don’t wish to capture what opens up in a formal schema of formal thinking [does name Being remain formal???] > impasse stems from Being itself? guidewords indicate a peculiar ambivalence of Being
HDG.BC.linkedContent: in the casting away & toward us don’t wish to capture what opens up in a formal schema of formal thinking [does name Being remain formal???] > impasse stems from Being itself? guidewords indicate a peculiar ambivalence of Being

HDG.BC.content: ground is inclusion that gathers out of itself & into itself, a gathering that grants the Open where all beings are [but not causa sui?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: ground is inclusion that gathers out of itself & into itself, a gathering that grants the Open where all beings are [but not causa sui?]

HDG.BC.content: Being withdraws from us when we say it > “Being has singularly burst open our human essence” > “we belong to Being, and yet not” >  homeless in our ownmost homeland, not directly allowed in—assuming we may thus name our own essence
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being withdraws from us when we say it > “Being has singularly burst open our human essence” > “we belong to Being, and yet not” > homeless in our ownmost homeland, not directly allowed in—assuming we may thus name our own essence

HDG.BC.content: remembrance into first inception is fore-thinking into more incipient inception > remembrance is placement into Being itself > Being remains closer to us than everything nearest, farther than all that is farthest > only appear to escape Being in favor & for sake of beings, whose density fills every openness > must become aware of our abode: becoming aware not just raising Being into consciousness [not mindfulness]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: remembrance into first inception is fore-thinking into more incipient inception > remembrance is placement into Being itself > Being remains closer to us than everything nearest, farther than all that is farthest > only appear to escape Being in favor & for sake of beings, whose density fills every openness > must become aware of our abode: becoming aware not just raising Being into consciousness [not mindfulness]

HDG.WM.content: science, submission to beings themselves, gives matter itself explicitly/solely first/last word: beings allowed to reveal themselves > human stance that guides science: irruption by one being called “human being” into whole of beings [Marx’s Gattungswesen]: through this irruption that breaks open beings show what/how they are [?]
HDG.WM.linkedContent: science, submission to beings themselves, gives matter itself explicitly/solely first/last word: beings allowed to reveal themselves > human stance that guides science: irruption by one being called “human being” into whole of beings [Marx’s Gattungswesen]: through this irruption that breaks open beings show what/how they are [?]

HDG.WM.content: no annihilation (Vernichtung) of whole of beings takes place in anxiety > nothing doesn’t attract, essentially repelling (abweisend) > nothing itself nihilates (das Nichts selbst nichtet), grants the nothing, not submitted to calculation of annihilation or negation (Verneinung) > nihilation manifests beings in heretofore concealed strangeness as what is radically other (schlechthin Andere) [totally other] re: nothing > originally nihilating nothing brings Dasein, for 1st time, before beings as such—in anxiety original openness of Being
HDG.WM.linkedContent: no annihilation (Vernichtung) of whole of beings takes place in anxiety > nothing doesn’t attract, essentially repelling (abweisend) > nothing itself nihilates (das Nichts selbst nichtet), grants the nothing, not submitted to calculation of annihilation or negation (Verneinung) > nihilation manifests beings in heretofore concealed strangeness as what is radically other (schlechthin Andere) [totally other] re: nothing > originally nihilating nothing brings Dasein, for 1st time, before beings as such—in anxiety original openness of Being

HDG.WM.content: “in the clear night of the nothing of anxiety the original openness of beings as such arises”
HDG.WM.linkedContent: “in the clear night of the nothing of anxiety the original openness of beings as such arises”

HDG.IWM.content: thinking attempted in Being and Time is “under way (unterwegs)” toward bringing thinking onto a way, toward opening a path for thinking [not there yet, telos, preparatory, provisional] > how could this conjecture (experienced here [really???]), that relation of Being to human essence belongs to Being itself, become explicit before every attempt to liberate Dasein from subjectivity, etc. [had to go through destruction via meaning of Being to think truth of Being]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: thinking attempted in Being and Time is “under way (unterwegs)” toward bringing thinking onto a way, toward opening a path for thinking [not there yet, telos, preparatory, provisional] > how could this conjecture (experienced here [really???]), that relation of Being to human essence belongs to Being itself, become explicit before every attempt to liberate Dasein from subjectivity, etc. [had to go through destruction via meaning of Being to think truth of Being]

HDG.IWM.content: [standing in that which folds you out] [great summary of existence of Dasein] withstanding (Ausstehen), as care, essence of ecstasis to be thought here, a “standing out” where “out” should be understood in terms of the “outside itself” of openness of Being itself > stasis of the ecstatic (as strange as it sounds): standing in the “out” and “there” of unconcealedness, prevails as essence of Being itself > replace “existence” w/ “in-standing (Inständigkeit)”
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: [standing in that which folds you out] [great summary of existence of Dasein] withstanding (Ausstehen), as care, essence of ecstasis to be thought here, a “standing out” where “out” should be understood in terms of the “outside itself” of openness of Being itself > stasis of the ecstatic (as strange as it sounds): standing in the “out” and “there” of unconcealedness, prevails as essence of Being itself > replace “existence” w/ “in-standing (Inständigkeit)”

HDG.IWM.content: “understanding”: relation that tries to enter into relation of truth of Being to human essence, ecstatic, thrown projection, standing in realm of the open > realm that opens for us in projection is called meaning > “Meaning of Being” says same as “truth of Being” [not identical?]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: “understanding”: relation that tries to enter into relation of truth of Being to human essence, ecstatic, thrown projection, standing in realm of the open > realm that opens for us in projection is called meaning > “Meaning of Being” says same as “truth of Being” [not identical?]

HDG.IWM.content: time belongs to truth of Being in a way still concealed > every holding open of truth of Being must look toward time as possible horizon of an understanding of Being [not there yet, telos] > time as provisional goal in Being and Time ——[nice, clever] proof of oblivion of Being, the reception of Being and Time ——ontotheology (first philosophy, philosophy proper) as twofold: truth of beings in their universality & in highest being
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: time belongs to truth of Being in a way still concealed > every holding open of truth of Being must look toward time as possible horizon of an understanding of Being [not there yet, telos] > time as provisional goal in Being and Time ——[nice, clever] proof of oblivion of Being, the reception of Being and Time ——ontotheology (first philosophy, philosophy proper) as twofold: truth of beings in their universality & in highest being

HDG.QB.content: Dasein “held into (hineingehalten)” “this” nothing: humans hold free the site (Ort) for the totally other (ganz Anderen) than beings, so that w/in this openness something like coming to presence (An-Wesen) (Being) can be given > Der Mensch ist der Platzhalter des Nichts
HDG.QB.linkedContent: Dasein “held into (hineingehalten)” “this” nothing: humans hold free the site (Ort) for the totally other (ganz Anderen) than beings, so that w/in this openness something like coming to presence (An-Wesen) (Being) can be given > Der Mensch ist der Platzhalter des Nichts

HDG.FS.content: that opposite of monde means impure (immonde) preserves something of Heraclitus’ “world” > fundamental relation of Greek language to nature: leaving nature open in its radiance (Strahlenden) vs. modern era: making nature’s appearances easily calculable
HDG.FS.linkedContent: that opposite of monde means impure (immonde) preserves something of Heraclitus’ “world” > fundamental relation of Greek language to nature: leaving nature open in its radiance (Strahlenden) vs. modern era: making nature’s appearances easily calculable

HDG.FS.content: logos as gathering, “projects itself toward things that appear in their gathering” > for Greek thought, presencing of human is opening inception for oppositional presencing of World > alētheia: encounter (Begegnung) btwn that which presences and being is a self-opening, welcomes (Empfang) presence [a site, Ort?] > alētheia can’t be translated as truth
HDG.FS.linkedContent: logos as gathering, “projects itself toward things that appear in their gathering” > for Greek thought, presencing of human is opening inception for oppositional presencing of World > alētheia: encounter (Begegnung) btwn that which presences and being is a self-opening, welcomes (Empfang) presence [a site, Ort?] > alētheia can’t be translated as truth

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger recognizes an accusation that he derived “being” from “is,” developed his philosophy form this “abstraction” > no, can only say “is” in openness of Being
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger recognizes an accusation that he derived “being” from “is,” developed his philosophy form this “abstraction” > no, can only say “is” in openness of Being

HDG.FS.content: Greeks lived immediately in openness of phenomena—through expressly ek-static capacity of letting phenomena speak to them (modern man, via Descartes, only talks to himself, human as representer), no Greek word for being of human in alētheia, not due to lack, but due to excess > belonging to alētheia as Greek destiny: moira
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Greeks lived immediately in openness of phenomena—through expressly ek-static capacity of letting phenomena speak to them (modern man, via Descartes, only talks to himself, human as representer), no Greek word for being of human in alētheia, not due to lack, but due to excess > belonging to alētheia as Greek destiny: moira

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger speaks of something inappropriate in formulation of “meaning of being,” possible to interpret “project” as a human performance, project only as structure of subjectivity (this is how Sartre reads it) > Heidegger countered this mistake w/ “truth of being,” still retaining meaning of project as opening disclosure (Erschliessung), and to assure that truth wasn’t confused w/ correctness, Heidegger explained it by “location (Ortschaft) of being,” which presupposes understanding of Ortseins des Ortes (place-being of place), hence Topologie des Seyns
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger speaks of something inappropriate in formulation of “meaning of being,” possible to interpret “project” as a human performance, project only as structure of subjectivity (this is how Sartre reads it) > Heidegger countered this mistake w/ “truth of being,” still retaining meaning of project as opening disclosure (Erschliessung), and to assure that truth wasn’t confused w/ correctness, Heidegger explained it by “location (Ortschaft) of being,” which presupposes understanding of Ortseins des Ortes (place-being of place), hence Topologie des Seyns

HDG.FS.content: [machine & event?] can a thinker ever reconcile these 2 “realms” that have grown foreign to one another: “technologically dominable nature of science” and “natural nature of the…dwelling of man” [reflections on Gelassenheit, comportment (Haltung) of “self-joining (Sicheinfügens),” cautious sheltering, opening to secret (Geheimnis)]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: [machine & event?] can a thinker ever reconcile these 2 “realms” that have grown foreign to one another: “technologically dominable nature of science” and “natural nature of the…dwelling of man” [reflections on Gelassenheit, comportment (Haltung) of “self-joining (Sicheinfügens),” cautious sheltering, opening to secret (Geheimnis)]

HDG.FS.content: meaning in “meaning of Being” defined re: project region, projection as accomplishment of Dasein, ek-static instancy in openness of Being: by ek-sisting, Dasein includes meaning > move to “truth of Being” emphasizes openness of Being itself, rather than openness of Dasein re: this openness of Being
HDG.FS.linkedContent: meaning in “meaning of Being” defined re: project region, projection as accomplishment of Dasein, ek-static instancy in openness of Being: by ek-sisting, Dasein includes meaning > move to “truth of Being” emphasizes openness of Being itself, rather than openness of Dasein re: this openness of Being

HDG.FS.content: Being and Time attempts to open a hearing for word of Being (not new signification [is that possible?]), let it be claimed (in Anspruch) by Being: to be the there, matter of becoming claimed by Being [attention of Being]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Being and Time attempts to open a hearing for word of Being (not new signification [is that possible?]), let it be claimed (in Anspruch) by Being: to be the there, matter of becoming claimed by Being [attention of Being]

HDG.FS.content: the 2 possibilities of end of physics: 1) open to entirely new relation to nature 2) after research concludes settle into thoughtless exploitation (gedankenlosen Ausbeutung) of the discovery (Entdeckung)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: the 2 possibilities of end of physics: 1) open to entirely new relation to nature 2) after research concludes settle into thoughtless exploitation (gedankenlosen Ausbeutung) of the discovery (Entdeckung)

HDG.FS.content: human belongs to openness of Being > Being, for its opening, needs man as the there of its manifestation [Larry’s emphasis] > Ge-stell helps us see that human is “used by being (vom Sein gebraucht),” also the shepherd of being, berger (French is better here), one who provides shelter > that Being needs something of human to be: finitude of being must be assumed (not absolutely for itself, pointed contradiction to Hegel)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: human belongs to openness of Being > Being, for its opening, needs man as the there of its manifestation [Larry’s emphasis] > Ge-stell helps us see that human is “used by being (vom Sein gebraucht),” also the shepherd of being, berger (French is better here), one who provides shelter > that Being needs something of human to be: finitude of being must be assumed (not absolutely for itself, pointed contradiction to Hegel)

HDG.FS.content: experience of instancy in clearing of Being, only possible through detour (Umweg) of return to beginning > return occurs in echo of Parmenides, the hearing that opens in our present age (epoch of sending [Schickung] of being as Ge-stell)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: experience of instancy in clearing of Being, only possible through detour (Umweg) of return to beginning > return occurs in echo of Parmenides, the hearing that opens in our present age (epoch of sending [Schickung] of being as Ge-stell)

HDG.MA.content: releasement (Gelassenheit) toward things & openness to mystery (Geheimnis) belong together: give vision of new autochtony which might recapture autochtony in changed form
HDG.MA.linkedContent: releasement (Gelassenheit) toward things & openness to mystery (Geheimnis) belong together: give vision of new autochtony which might recapture autochtony in changed form

HDG.MA.content: possible that technology in atomic age could captivate/bewitch/dazzle/beguile so that calculative thinking accepted/practiced as the only way of thinking [end of philosophy] > keep meditative thinking: persistent courageous thinking allows Gelassenheit, openness to Geheimnis, to flourish
HDG.MA.linkedContent: possible that technology in atomic age could captivate/bewitch/dazzle/beguile so that calculative thinking accepted/practiced as the only way of thinking [end of philosophy] > keep meditative thinking: persistent courageous thinking allows Gelassenheit, openness to Geheimnis, to flourish

HDG.CCP.content: other side of horizon as a region, enchanted region: “where everything belonging there returns in that in which it rests” > openness as a region, the region of regions, the region
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: other side of horizon as a region, enchanted region: “where everything belonging there returns in that in which it rests” > openness as a region, the region of regions, the region

HDG.CCP.content: the region gathers, each to each, while resting in itself: “regioning is a gathering and re-sheltering (versammelnde Zurückbergen) for an expanded resting (Beruhen) in an abiding (Weile)” [Gegnet], in Gegnet, openness is halted and held [Derrida beyond Heidegger]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: the region gathers, each to each, while resting in itself: “regioning is a gathering and re-sheltering (versammelnde Zurückbergen) for an expanded resting (Beruhen) in an abiding (Weile)” [Gegnet], in Gegnet, openness is halted and held [Derrida beyond Heidegger]

HDG.CCP.content: waiting (warten) is not awaiting (erwarten): done waiting when we represent what we are waiting for > remaining is a returning > openness itself is Gegnet, into which we’re released by waiting when we think > thinking: coming-into-the-nearness of distance > how come you suddenly could wait?
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: waiting (warten) is not awaiting (erwarten): done waiting when we represent what we are waiting for > remaining is a returning > openness itself is Gegnet, into which we’re released by waiting when we think > thinking: coming-into-the-nearness of distance > how come you suddenly could wait?

HDG.CCP.content: one often doesn’t know whose tale he retells [baby daddy] > releasement as experience of waiting: release oneself into openness of Gegnet, waiting a relation to Gegnet, perhaps the relation > “relation to something would be the true relation if it were held in its own nature by that which it relates” [hetero-tautology, Derrida beyond Heidegger]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: one often doesn’t know whose tale he retells [baby daddy] > releasement as experience of waiting: release oneself into openness of Gegnet, waiting a relation to Gegnet, perhaps the relation > “relation to something would be the true relation if it were held in its own nature by that which it relates” [hetero-tautology, Derrida beyond Heidegger]

HDG.CCP.content: waiting (upon opening of Gegnet) = Gelassenheit—is waiting named adequately? [cf. p. 72]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: waiting (upon opening of Gegnet) = Gelassenheit—is waiting named adequately? [cf. p. 72]

HDG.CCP.content: night neighbors the stars, binds together w/out seam, edge or thread [Derrida beyond Heidegger] > neighbors because she works only w/ nearness > wondering upon depths of the height > wonder can open what is locked > by way of waiting > if this is released > and human nature remains appropriated to that > from whence we’re called
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: night neighbors the stars, binds together w/out seam, edge or thread [Derrida beyond Heidegger] > neighbors because she works only w/ nearness > wondering upon depths of the height > wonder can open what is locked > by way of waiting > if this is released > and human nature remains appropriated to that > from whence we’re called

HDG.DL.content: language defines (bestimmt) the hermeneutic relation: go right on releasing (entlassen) into open whatever might be said (not a non-committal drifting away)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: language defines (bestimmt) the hermeneutic relation: go right on releasing (entlassen) into open whatever might be said (not a non-committal drifting away)

HDG.DL.content: to think Greeks in even more Greek manner doesn’t mean better than them: great thinking understands itself best, i.e. understands itself, w/in limits set for it (zugemessenen Grenzen) > to think more originally than Greeks: to think the unthought clearing (Lichten), the occurrence (Ereignis) [?] of emergence (Hervorkommen) into openness (Lichte) [?], unconcealedness (appearance of that which is present)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: to think Greeks in even more Greek manner doesn’t mean better than them: great thinking understands itself best, i.e. understands itself, w/in limits set for it (zugemessenen Grenzen) > to think more originally than Greeks: to think the unthought clearing (Lichten), the occurrence (Ereignis) [?] of emergence (Hervorkommen) into openness (Lichte) [?], unconcealedness (appearance of that which is present)

HDG.DL.content: [re: method of “Expression and Appearance”] never did more than follow a faint trail (Wegspur) > die Spur (dark, perplexing, lightning-sharp, sudden insight [Einblick] [instant]): almost imperceptible promise (vernehmbares Versprechen) announcing (ankündete) we’d be set free into open (ins Freie) > eluded every effort to say it
HDG.DL.linkedContent: [re: method of “Expression and Appearance”] never did more than follow a faint trail (Wegspur) > die Spur (dark, perplexing, lightning-sharp, sudden insight [Einblick] [instant]): almost imperceptible promise (vernehmbares Versprechen) announcing (ankündete) we’d be set free into open (ins Freie) > eluded every effort to say it

HDG.DL.content: Iki: breath of stillness of luminous delight (Entzückens) > delight: what ensnares (Entziehen), carries away (Hinzücken)—into stillness > delight is the same kind as the hint that beckons on, to and fro (des Fort- und Hin- und Her-winkens) > hint is message of the veiling that opens up (lichtenden Verhüllens) > so all presence (Anwesen) has its source in grace (Anmut): pure delight of the calling stillness (rufenden Stille)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: Iki: breath of stillness of luminous delight (Entzückens) > delight: what ensnares (Entziehen), carries away (Hinzücken)—into stillness > delight is the same kind as the hint that beckons on, to and fro (des Fort- und Hin- und Her-winkens) > hint is message of the veiling that opens up (lichtenden Verhüllens) > so all presence (Anwesen) has its source in grace (Anmut): pure delight of the calling stillness (rufenden Stille)

HDG.LP.content: land: open region that promises & guards a dwelling (Wohnen) > Trakl’s land is older, more promising than Platonic-Christian land (European West): apartness is “first-beginning” of mounting world-year (steigenden Weltjahres), not abyss of decay
HDG.LP.linkedContent: land: open region that promises & guards a dwelling (Wohnen) > Trakl’s land is older, more promising than Platonic-Christian land (European West): apartness is “first-beginning” of mounting world-year (steigenden Weltjahres), not abyss of decay

HDG.WL.content: a web compresses, obstructs the straight clear view (gerade Durchsicht) in its mesh (Verflochtenen) [condensation] > we can’t disregard web of language, what seems its hopeless tangle > attempt to loosen the web to view the “open togetherness (freie Zusammengehören) of the relations named in the formula”: try to experience unbinding bond (entbindende Band) in web of language
HDG.WL.linkedContent: a web compresses, obstructs the straight clear view (gerade Durchsicht) in its mesh (Verflochtenen) [condensation] > we can’t disregard web of language, what seems its hopeless tangle > attempt to loosen the web to view the “open togetherness (freie Zusammengehören) of the relations named in the formula”: try to experience unbinding bond (entbindende Band) in web of language

HDG.WL.content: Heidegger will call the unity of language: Aufriss (design rift), name demands we see proper of language’s essence more clearly > [English translator offers etymology of “sign” in design, Latin signum, secare, to cut] riss like ritzen (carve), to cut a furrow in soil, open to seed/growth > Auf-riss the whole of the traits (Züge) that structures & prevails throughout (durchfügt) the open/freedom of language > Aufriss the drawing/outline (Zeichnung) of language, structure (Gefüge) of a show/indication (Zeigens) in which speakers/speaking, spoken/unspoken, are joined (verfugt)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: Heidegger will call the unity of language: Aufriss (design rift), name demands we see proper of language’s essence more clearly > [English translator offers etymology of “sign” in design, Latin signum, secare, to cut] riss like ritzen (carve), to cut a furrow in soil, open to seed/growth > Auf-riss the whole of the traits (Züge) that structures & prevails throughout (durchfügt) the open/freedom of language > Aufriss the drawing/outline (Zeichnung) of language, structure (Gefüge) of a show/indication (Zeigens) in which speakers/speaking, spoken/unspoken, are joined (verfugt)

HDG.WL.content: showing prevails in Saying, even in everything that waits for us unspoken > Saying not linguistic expression added to phenomenon: all radiant appearance/fading away grounded (beruht) in showing Saying > Saying pervades (durchwaltet)/structures (fügt) openness of clearing (das Freie der Lichtung) that every appearance must seek & every disappearance must leave behind, in which all present/absent being must show/say/announce itself > Saying: the gathering that joins all appearance (alles Scheinen fügende Versammlung), lets all that shows abide w/in itself, the in-itself manifold showing
HDG.WL.linkedContent: showing prevails in Saying, even in everything that waits for us unspoken > Saying not linguistic expression added to phenomenon: all radiant appearance/fading away grounded (beruht) in showing Saying > Saying pervades (durchwaltet)/structures (fügt) openness of clearing (das Freie der Lichtung) that every appearance must seek & every disappearance must leave behind, in which all present/absent being must show/say/announce itself > Saying: the gathering that joins all appearance (alles Scheinen fügende Versammlung), lets all that shows abide w/in itself, the in-itself manifold showing

HDG.WL.content: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)

HDG.WL.content: along the way, what looks like a tangle untangles [arrival?], release/light of way-making movement > movement brings Saying to speech, Saying keeps way open > die Be-wëgung der Sage zur Sprache ist das entbindende Band, das verbindet, indem es er-eignet [bond that binds by appropriating] > language delivered (entbunden) to its own freedom: concerned solely w/ itself > but language as Saying not only self-seeking, the appropriating showing disregards precisely itself, to free what is shown to its proper appearance [withdrawal of language, Saying, Ereignis]
HDG.WL.linkedContent: along the way, what looks like a tangle untangles [arrival?], release/light of way-making movement > movement brings Saying to speech, Saying keeps way open > die Be-wëgung der Sage zur Sprache ist das entbindende Band, das verbindet, indem es er-eignet [bond that binds by appropriating] > language delivered (entbunden) to its own freedom: concerned solely w/ itself > but language as Saying not only self-seeking, the appropriating showing disregards precisely itself, to free what is shown to its proper appearance [withdrawal of language, Saying, Ereignis]

HDG.EC.content: overcome by something healing (Heilsames) on a walk: not just the capaciousness (Geräumige) of the expanse (Weite) but the expanse itself > carried to what is objectless w/out dissolving, expanse delivers our essence to the open (Offene), gathers it into simplicity: as if the expanse’s abiding (Verweilen) were a pure arrival (reine Ankunft)—we are the entranceway (Einlass) [cf. p. 147]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: overcome by something healing (Heilsames) on a walk: not just the capaciousness (Geräumige) of the expanse (Weite) but the expanse itself > carried to what is objectless w/out dissolving, expanse delivers our essence to the open (Offene), gathers it into simplicity: as if the expanse’s abiding (Verweilen) were a pure arrival (reine Ankunft)—we are the entranceway (Einlass) [cf. p. 147]

HDG.EC.content: your experience of healing now heals me, letting us become those who wait > the far is near in the nearness of what is held in reserve (Aufbehaltenen), the farness (Ferne) of what is dear (Holden) > for those who wait, the difference (Unterschied) btwn near/far opens most purely > those who wait will guard themselves from hastening to know that which heals in itself
HDG.EC.linkedContent: your experience of healing now heals me, letting us become those who wait > the far is near in the nearness of what is held in reserve (Aufbehaltenen), the farness (Ferne) of what is dear (Holden) > for those who wait, the difference (Unterschied) btwn near/far opens most purely > those who wait will guard themselves from hastening to know that which heals in itself

HDG.EC.content: [Chinese philosophy] “human needs only enough space to be able to put his foot down” > but what use would be that standing if a crevice opened up to the underworld around it? [shortest shadow] > no more use > from this, necessity of unnecessary clearly apparent
HDG.EC.linkedContent: [Chinese philosophy] “human needs only enough space to be able to put his foot down” > but what use would be that standing if a crevice opened up to the underworld around it? [shortest shadow] > no more use > from this, necessity of unnecessary clearly apparent

HDG.OHF.content: re: Aristotle’s Peri Ermēneias, solely important [in this context] re: history of meaning of word: discourse (Rede) makes something accessible (zugänglich), brings out into open, ready to hand (vorhanden) > thus logos has distinctive possibility of alētheuein (being-true), making what was concealed unconcealed [comes to light through logos]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: re: Aristotle’s Peri Ermēneias, solely important [in this context] re: history of meaning of word: discourse (Rede) makes something accessible (zugänglich), brings out into open, ready to hand (vorhanden) > thus logos has distinctive possibility of alētheuein (being-true), making what was concealed unconcealed [comes to light through logos]

HDG.OHF.content: as open space of publicness, nothing eludes the talk: averageness (Durchschnittlichkeit), discusses everything w/ insensitivity to difference (Unterschiedsunempfindlichkeit) > Öffentlichkeit as being of “Man (every-one)”: everyone says that, everyone expects that, talk in circulation belongs to no one [Irigaray] > “Man” = “Niemand” > Dasein haunted like a specter by this circulation, a how of factical life that pays tribute to the fateful undoing (Verhängnisses) of facticity
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: as open space of publicness, nothing eludes the talk: averageness (Durchschnittlichkeit), discusses everything w/ insensitivity to difference (Unterschiedsunempfindlichkeit) > Öffentlichkeit as being of “Man (every-one)”: everyone says that, everyone expects that, talk in circulation belongs to no one [Irigaray] > “Man” = “Niemand” > Dasein haunted like a specter by this circulation, a how of factical life that pays tribute to the fateful undoing (Verhängnisses) of facticity

HDG.OHF.content: [cf. OPEN in Derrida] historical consciousness is “there,” brings itself into open publicity (Öffentlichkeit) w/ a definite self-interpretation (bestimmten Selbstauslegung)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [cf. OPEN in Derrida] historical consciousness is “there,” brings itself into open publicity (Öffentlichkeit) w/ a definite self-interpretation (bestimmten Selbstauslegung)

HDG.OHF.content: categories are haphazardly employed (from disparate sources) to characterize the basis (Boden) from out of which classifying begins to run its course (seinen Gang nimmt) > “that the Ausgangsverhalten is unworried (Unbekümmertheit) [since worry is there in opening to phenomenological hermeneutics] about its own concrete and precise clarification when the classifying and filing away is being done” “is only a symptom of the fact that its objects are ‘only’ material for a typology and system of classification” > idea of knowledge pursued (angestrebte) here, already sketched out in advance (schon vorgezeichnet) [goes on to describe static system, structuralism even]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: categories are haphazardly employed (from disparate sources) to characterize the basis (Boden) from out of which classifying begins to run its course (seinen Gang nimmt) > “that the Ausgangsverhalten is unworried (Unbekümmertheit) [since worry is there in opening to phenomenological hermeneutics] about its own concrete and precise clarification when the classifying and filing away is being done” “is only a symptom of the fact that its objects are ‘only’ material for a typology and system of classification” > idea of knowledge pursued (angestrebte) here, already sketched out in advance (schon vorgezeichnet) [goes on to describe static system, structuralism even]

HDG.OHF.content: [method: Heidegger now tries to show what is there for Dasein in the 2 interpretative modes (philosophy, historical consciousness)] Dasein itself goes toward something, having itself objectively there for itself, bringing itself objectively into its there > historical consciousness & philosophy are modes of Dasein, paths held open (preserved in itself), paths of securing/making certain, paths of falling away > Dasein encounters itself free of standpoints in objective certainty: 1) historical consciousness, Dasein encounters wealth of objective being of its having-been (Gewesenseins) 2) philosophy, Dasein encounters immutability of its always-being-in-such-a-manner (Immersoseins) > both interpretations bring Dasein before its highest & pure present
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method: Heidegger now tries to show what is there for Dasein in the 2 interpretative modes (philosophy, historical consciousness)] Dasein itself goes toward something, having itself objectively there for itself, bringing itself objectively into its there > historical consciousness & philosophy are modes of Dasein, paths held open (preserved in itself), paths of securing/making certain, paths of falling away > Dasein encounters itself free of standpoints in objective certainty: 1) historical consciousness, Dasein encounters wealth of objective being of its having-been (Gewesenseins) 2) philosophy, Dasein encounters immutability of its always-being-in-such-a-manner (Immersoseins) > both interpretations bring Dasein before its highest & pure present
